p: The results of all the studied variables are presented as mean ± SD (standard deviation). One-way analysis of variance (ANOVA) was carried out using Statistica software (Statistical v13, TIBC, Palo Alto, CA 94304, USA) and the mean values were separated according to Duncan’s multiple range test. Graphical presentations were made using Microsoft Excel (Version: 16.0.13029.20344, Microsoft Cooperation, Washington, DC, USA).
